short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays the MCCI kill sound when an assignment is submitted in Brightspace/D2L, Google Classroom, or Canvas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension functions as a fun addition to popular Learning Management Systems: Canvas, Brightspace/d2l, and Google Classroom. 
Upon submission of an assignment you will meet the auditory reinforcement of the MCCI kill sound bite. (you're killing it... badum tsss)
